ac.breakdown: Base Armor Class 10, Base Modifier +13, Dexterity +4
ac.name: ac

description.value:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 2d6 persistent acid damage, and 2 acid splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 2d6 persistent acid damage, and 2 acid splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 2d8 fire damage, 2 persistent fire damage, and 2 fire splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 2d8 fire damage, 2 persistent fire damage, and 2 fire splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.
Originally a farming tool used for reaping grain, this one‑handed weapon has a short wooden handle ending in a curved blade, sometimes sharpened on both sides.
Originally a farming tool used for reaping grain, this one‑handed weapon has a short wooden handle ending in a curved blade, sometimes sharpened on both sides.
This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

[[/r 2d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}

[[/r 2 #acid]] acid splash damage

[[/r 2 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}

[[/r 2 #fire]] fire splash damage

Requirements The chemist has at least one bomb in their possession;

Effect The chemist adds a hasty mix of noxious substances to the bomb and makes a ranged Strike with it. If it hits and deals damage, the target must attempt a Fortitude save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]] rounds; if the result of the save is a critical failure, this increases to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3}. For the next 24 hours, the affected target takes a -2 circumstance penalty (-3 on a critical failure) to additional Fortitude saving throws against the same chemist's Crude Bombs.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.Effect: Dirty Bomb]{Effect: Dirty Bomb}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure)]{Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure)}

Requirements The chemist has their alchemist's tools, formula book, and a free hand;

Effect The chemist creates a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Moderate)]{Moderate Acid Flask} or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)]{Alchemist's Fire} that they must use before the end of their next turn or else it becomes inert.
